title: Invert Object Key-Value Pairs
description: In this lab, we will explore how to invert an object's key-value pairs without mutating the original object. We will use the Object.keys() method and Array.prototype.reduce() to invert the object. Additionally, we will learn how to apply a function to the inverted keys and return an array of keys responsible for generating the inverted value.

meta.title: Object Inversion | Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to invert an object's key-value pairs without mutating the original object using JavaScript methods like Object.keys() and Array.prototype.reduce().
meta.keywords: object inversion, key-value pairs, JavaScript, programming tutorial, Object.keys, Array.prototype.reduce

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 反转对象键值对
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何在不改变原始对象的情况下反转对象的键值对。我们将使用Object.keys()方法和Array.prototype.reduce()来反转对象。此外，我们还将学习如何将一个函数应用于反转后的键，并返回负责生成反转后值的键的数组。

meta.title: 对象反转 | 编程教程
meta.description: 学习如何使用Object.keys()和Array.prototype.reduce()等JavaScript方法在不改变原始对象的情况下反转对象的键值对。
meta.keywords: 对象反转, 键值对, JavaScript, 编程教程, Object.keys, Array.prototype.reduce
